TopicTitle: previous version install issue on Mac...

Articles.Content:
Hello,

So I have an old mac and when I tried to install KSP 1.73 onto it, it said that I needed OSX 10.8.  I recently upgraded that mac to OX 10.8 and tried installing and now it says that I need OSX 10.9.  I went and downloaded KSP 1.6, which is an older version that undoubtedly ran on OSX 10.8, but when I install it, it ALSO says that I need OSX 10.9.

How is this possible?  What can be done so that I can install and play an older version of KSP???
